text: Veijo Olavi Puhjo (26 June 1948 â€“ 9 December 2019) was a Finnish politician. He was a member of Finnish Parliament, representing the Left Alliance. He was elected in 1995 and retired in 2001. He was born in Loimaa, Finland. Puhjo was born in Loimaa, Finland. Puhjo died on 9 December 2019 in Pori, Finland at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== *Parliament of Finland: Veijo Puhjo Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Finnish politicians
